verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> again to me saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> prophesy <S%H5012><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Wail, <S%H3213><s%> 'Alas <S%H1929><s%> for the day! <S%H3117><s%>'

"For the day <S%H3117><s%> is near, <S%H7138><s%> Even the day <S%H3117><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is near; <S%H7138><s%> It will be a day <S%H3117><s%> of clouds, <S%H6051><s%> A time <S%H6256><s%> [of doom] for the nations. <S%H1471><s%>

"And a sword <S%H2719><s%> will come <S%H935><s%> upon Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> And anguish <S%H2479><s%> will be in Ethiopia, <S%H3568><s%> When the slain <S%H2491><s%> fall <S%H5307><s%> in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> They take <S%H3947><s%> away her wealth, <S%H1995><s%> And her foundations <S%H3247><s%> are torn <S%H2040><s%> down. <S%H2040><s%>

"Ethiopia, <S%H3568><s%> Put, <S%H6316><s%> Lud, <S%H3865><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> Arabia, <S%H6152><s%> Libya, <S%H3864><s%> and the people <S%H1121><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> that is in league <S%H1285><s%> will fall <S%H5307><s%> with them by the sword. <S%H2719><s%>"

'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "Indeed, those who support <S%H5564><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%> will fall, <S%H5307><s%> And the pride <S%H1347><s%> of her power <S%H5797><s%> will come <S%H3381><s%> down; <S%H3381><s%> From Migdol <S%H4024><s%> [to] Syene <S%H5482><s%> They will fall <S%H5307><s%> within her by the sword, <S%H2719><s%>" Declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>

"And they will be desolate <S%H8074><s%> In the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the desolated <S%H8074><s%> lands; <S%H776><s%> And her cities <S%H5892><s%> will be In the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the devastated <S%H2717><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

"And they will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> When I set <S%H5414><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> her helpers <S%H5826><s%> are broken. <S%H7665><s%>

"On that day <S%H3117><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> will go <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> from Me in ships <S%H6716><s%> to frighten <S%H2729><s%> secure <S%H983><s%> Ethiopia; <S%H3568><s%> and anguish <S%H2479><s%> will be on them as on the day <S%H3117><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> for, behold, <S%H2009><s%> it comes! <S%H935><s%>"

'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "I will also make the multitude <S%H1995><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> cease <S%H7673><s%> By the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon. <S%H894><s%>

"He and his people <S%H5971><s%> with him, The most <S%H6184><s%> ruthless <S%H6184><s%> of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> Will be brought <S%H935><s%> in to destroy <S%H7843><s%> the land; <S%H776><s%> And they will draw <S%H9553><s%> their swords <S%H2719><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%> And fill <S%H4390><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> with the slain. <S%H2491><s%>

"Moreover, I will make <S%H5414><s%> the Nile <S%H2975><s%> canals <S%H2975><s%> dry <S%H2724><s%> And sell <S%H4376><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of evil <S%H7451><s%> men. <S%H7451><s%> And I will make <S%H8074><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> desolate, <S%H8074><s%> And all <S%H4393><s%> that is in it, By the hand <S%H3027><s%> of strangers; <S%H2114><s%> I, the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> have spoken. <S%H1696><s%>"

'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "I will also destroy the idols <S%H6><s%> And make the images <S%H1544><s%> cease <S%H457><s%> from Memphis. <S%H7673><s%> And there will no <S%H5297><s%> longer <S%H3808><s%> be a prince <S%H5750><s%> in the land <S%H5387><s%> of Egypt; <S%H776><s%> And I will put <S%H4714><s%> fear <S%H5414><s%> in the land <S%H3374><s%> of Egypt. <S%H776><s%>

"And I will make <S%H8074><s%> Pathros <S%H6624><s%> desolate, <S%H8074><s%> Set <S%H5414><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> in Zoan, <S%H6814><s%> And execute <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> on Thebes. <S%H4996><s%>

"And I will pour <S%H8210><s%> out My wrath <S%H2534><s%> on Sin, <S%H5512><s%> The stronghold <S%H4581><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> I will also cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> the multitude <S%H1995><s%> of Thebes. <S%H4996><s%>

"And I will set <S%H5414><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> in Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> Sin <S%H5512><s%> will writhe <S%H9123><s%> in anguish, <S%H9123><s%> Thebes <S%H4996><s%> will be breached, <S%H1234><s%> And Memphis <S%H5297><s%> [will have] distresses <S%H6862><s%> daily. <S%H3119><s%>

"The young <S%H970><s%> men <S%H970><s%> of On <S%H204><s%> and of Pi-beseth Will fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> And the women <S%H1992><s%> will go <S%H1980><s%> into captivity. <S%H7628><s%>

"And in Tehaphnehes <S%H8471><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> will be dark <S%H2821><s%> When I break <S%H7665><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> the yoke <S%H4133><s%> bars <S%H4133><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%> Then the pride <S%H1347><s%> of her power <S%H5797><s%> will cease <S%H7673><s%> in her; A cloud <S%H6051><s%> will cover <S%H3680><s%> her, And her daughters <S%H1323><s%> will go <S%H1980><s%> into captivity. <S%H7628><s%>
"Thus I will execute <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> on Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> And they will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>"' "

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about in the eleventh <S%H259><s%> <S%H6240><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> in the first <S%H7223><s%> [month, <S%H2320><s%>] on the seventh <S%H7651><s%> of the month, that the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> I have broken <S%H7665><s%> the arm <S%H2220><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> it has not been bound <S%H2280><s%> up for healing <S%H7499><s%> or wrapped <S%H2280><s%> with a bandage, <S%H2848><s%> that it may be strong <S%H2388><s%> to hold <S%H8610><s%> the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

"Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> 'Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am against <S%H413><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and will break <S%H7665><s%> his arms, <S%H2220><s%> both the strong <S%H2389><s%> and the broken; <S%H7665><s%> and I will make the sword <S%H2719><s%> fall <S%H5307><s%> from his hand. <S%H3027><s%>
'And I will scatter <S%H6327><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%> and disperse <S%H2219><s%> them among the lands. <S%H776><s%>

'For I will strengthen <S%H2388><s%> the arms <S%H2220><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> My sword <S%H2719><s%> in his hand; <S%H3027><s%> and I will break <S%H7665><s%> the arms <S%H2220><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> so that he will groan <S%H5008><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him with the groanings <S%H5009><s%> of a wounded <S%H2491><s%> man. <S%H2491><s%>

'Thus I will strengthen <S%H2388><s%> the arms <S%H2220><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> but the arms <S%H2220><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> will fall. <S%H5307><s%> Then they will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> when I put <S%H5414><s%> My sword <S%H2719><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> and he stretches <S%H5186><s%> it out against <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

'When I scatter <S%H6327><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%> and disperse <S%H2219><s%> them among the lands, <S%H776><s%> then they will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>' "
